Package io.particle.device.control

Class BleRequestChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.particle.device.control.BleRequestChannel
  • public class BleRequestChannel
extends java.lang.Object
    An implementation of the Device OS control request protocol for BLE.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  BleRequestChannel.State
      The channel state.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int DEFAULT_MAX_CONCURRENT_REQUESTS
      The default maximum number of requests that can be sent to the device concurrently.

                         BleRequestChannelCallback callback)
        Construct a channel.

        callback - The channel callbacks.

      • BleRequestChannel

        public BleRequestChannel​(byte[] secret,
                         BleRequestChannelCallback callback,
                         int maxConcurrentRequests)
        Construct a channel.
        Parameters:
        secret - The pre-shared secret.
        callback - The channel callbacks.
        maxConcurrentRequests - The maximum number of requests that can be sent to the device concurrently.

      • BleRequestChannel

        public BleRequestChannel​(byte[] secret,
                         BleRequestChannelCallback callback,
                         int maxConcurrentRequests,
                         java.security.SecureRandom random)
        Construct a channel.
        Parameters:
        secret - The pre-shared secret.
        callback - The channel callbacks.
        maxConcurrentRequests - The maximum number of requests that can be sent to the device concurrently.
        random - The secure random number generator to use.

    • Method Detail

      • open

        public void open()
        Open the channel. The BleRequestChannelCallback.onChannelOpen() callback will be invoked when the channel has been opened. It is the responsibility of the calling code to track the timeout of the operation.

      • close

        public void close()
        Close the channel. All pending requests will be cancelled with an error. A closed channel cannot be reopened.

      • read

        public void read​(byte[] data)
        Read data received from the device.
        Parameters:
        data - The received data.

      • sendRequest

        public int sendRequest​(int type)
        Send a request to the device.
        Parameters:
        type - The request type.
        Returns:
        The request ID.

      • sendRequest

        public int sendRequest​(int type,
                       byte[] data)
        Send a request to the device. It is the responsibility of the calling code to track the timeout of the operation. If necessary, the request can be cancelled at any time via cancelRequest(int).
        Parameters:
        type - The request type.
        type - The payload data.
        Returns:
        The request ID.

      • cancelRequest

        public boolean cancelRequest​(int id)
        Cancel a request.
        Parameters:
        id - The request ID.
        Returns:
        `true` if the request was cancelled, otherwise `false`.

      • state

        public BleRequestChannel.State state()
        Get the channel state.
        Returns:
        The channel state.
